full_text:
Finally, finally finished up this graph. 

Here are the EPA distributions for our 2021 rookie QB's on dropbacks. 

Big thanks to @CedScherer  @BrunoHMioto @mrcaseb  who walked me through my struggles. It really is amazing the kind of help people provide on here!

Something new!

I isolated the EPA impact of penalties called on each team in 2021. This shows the average expected points that each team has lost due to penalties on offense and defense from Week 1 to Week 7.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/ojI977sSzd

The "Ja'Marr Chase down there somewhere" effect: Cincinnati is 8th in points scored this year, but dead last (!) in Red Zone plays. Takeaways:
